description: ff. 20. 200 x 145; 152 x 90 mm. 21 lin. 18th cen. On prophets, companions of the Prophet, scholars, and saints buried in Damascus or elsewhere in Syria, in three bābs. Apparently identical with Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 433 (17, no. 3): al-Nubdhah al-sanīyah...). Incip.: ... الحمد لله الذى جعل الشام شامتة من بلاد
author: Biqāʻī, Yāsīn ibn Muṣṭafá, 17th cent
title: Nubdhah laṭīfah fī al-mazārāt al-sharīfah
creator: Biqāʻī, Yāsīn ibn Muṣṭafá, 17th cent
subject: Arabs—Syria—History—Early works to 1800
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
